title: Meow meow
creator_credit: Yvonne Anderson, Red Grooms, Dominic Falcone, Ruckus Films and Yellow Ball Workshop
brief_description: A man and his pet lion. The lion overthrows a kidnapper and becomes a celebrity of New York City, type of city. he stars in a musical, is eventually kidnapped himself, is saved by a black bartender and eats the kidnappers. Totally wild, over the top, visually very colourful and fun animation.
